name: REAL AEROCLUB DE ALICANTE
about: The Real Aeroclub de Alicante is a reputable flight training organization approved by the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) with the reference E-ATO-070. Established to provide comprehensive aviation training, the aeroclub offers a range of programs and courses designed to help students achieve their Aircraft Private Pilot license and beyond. Located at the Alicante airport, the school benefits from ideal flight conditions and controlled navigation environments, making it an excellent choice for aspiring pilots. With a focus on using the latest technologies and procedures, the aeroclub ensures that students receive practical training similar to that of airline operations. The school is committed to providing high-quality instruction, modern facilities, and a supportive learning environment, making it an ideal place to embark on your aviation journey. Join the Real Aeroclub de Alicante to take your first steps towards becoming a licensed pilot.
